participant_1.background:
I love to be active and look my best, but I can get sad when I lose a loved one.
i work as a veterinarian.
i own four german shepherds.
i like meat too much.
After quitting my job, I devoted my time to raising and selling pigs.

participant_2.background:
I love to play with my baby's mobile.
I am a clumsy person who likes to read pet training blogs and websites.
i have aspergers.
I play the flute to bring peace and tranquility to my surroundings.
I will do laundry and spend time with my family.

content.text: Hello! What is your favorite hobby?
Hello! I love to play the flute. It brings peace and tranquility to my surroundings.
That's cool! I have been playing the guitar for a few years now.
Awesome! Do you play any songs for your family?
I do! I love to play songs that I know they will enjoy.
That's so sweet! I bet they love that.
They do! They always ask me to play for them when they come over.
That's great! I bet they are really proud of you.
They are! They love to see me perform.
That's amazing! What other hobbies do you have?
I also love to raise and sell pigs. I have four german shepherds that help me out with the work.
That's so cool! I've never raised pigs before.
It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I bet it is! I love animals.
